name: GeekCamp SG
description: What is it? Conference for the geeks. No startup talks. No how to get rich talks. This is purely a tech conference. Hashtag: #geekcampsg | Date: 18th October 2014 | Time: 9:30am to 6pm (Afterparty afterwards) | Location: NUS School of Computing. Ticket sales can be found over at Peatix http://geekcampsg14.peatix.com/

name: SG Hack and Tell
description: Present a hack and the tech behind it, not pitch your startup.

name: Creative Coding Meetup #2
description: Its time for 2nd meetup at our cozy zopim hq! this might be the last time it would be hosted here (we are upgrading venue for the next in nov!) 7 - 730pm: Refreshments + Networking 730: Opening 740 - 8:  Benjamin Low -
from Eyeo 2014 If you're interested to speak here, please contact Joshua! Venue and Food proudly sponsored by Zopim. Do RSVP so we estimate the amount of food to order!
